properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mungu muumba, twakutolea,
sadaka safi, ee Baba pokea. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Sadaka, ee Baba pokea,
sadaka, ee Baba pokea.
Tunakutolea sadaka safi,
tunakutolea sadaka safi.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mkate huu, twakutolea,
Baba twaomba,
ee Baba pokea. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Divai hii twakutolea,
Baba twaomba,
ee Baba pokea. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mazao yetu ya mashambani,
twakutolea,
ee Baba pokea. x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Maisha yetu, kwa roho safi,
twakutolea,
ee Baba pokea. x2

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Kwa leo hii, twakushukuru,
kwa wema wako,
ee Baba pokea. x2

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Furaha yetu, uchungu wetu,
twakutolea,
Ee Baba pokea. x2
